item.title: Trump expands travel ban to 39 countries after shooting of Guard members
item.description: The administration added 20 countries to the 19 whose citizens already faced full or partial restrictions on entering the United States.

item.title: What the end of Trump’s first year looks like
item.description: Prices and deportations are going up, while polls regularly show a majority disapproves of his presidency and that most of his major policies are unpo...

item.title: Coast Guard enacts policy calling swastikas, nooses ‘potentially divisive’
item.description: The Coast Guard’s workplace harassment manual that downgrades the definition of swastikas and nooses quietly went into effect this week.

item.title: Internal Forest Service report finds ‘unpassable trails, unsafe bridges’
